KnowledgeItem.Title: NewRelicWorkflowHandlePKG
KnowledgeItem.Description: Initiates the workflow for installing and starting the NewRelic Monitoring server

IssueCondition.Description: Searches for an Issue with DataBlock NewRelicWorkflowHandlePKG and triggers the workflow for sucessful completion

Activate.XMLExtract:
<NewBlock><Tasks
		       TargetMachine=${NRWHP:TargetMachine}      
			   TargetState=Created
			   Lib=RUNCOMMAND
			   Command='sudo sh -c 'echo deb http://apt.newrelic.com/debian/ newrelic non-free > /etc/apt/sources.list.d/newrelic.list''
			   User=${NRWHP:User}
			   Host=${NRWHP:Host}
			   CurrentState=ReadState
			   TaskNumber=${PROTASKS:NumberTotal}
			 /> </NewBlock>

<NewBlock><Tasks
		       TargetMachine=${NRWHP:TargetMachine}      
			   TargetState=Created
			   Lib=RUNCOMMAND
			   Command='wget -O- https://download.newrelic.com/548C16BF.gpg | sudo apt-key add -'
			   User=${NRWHP:User}
			   Host=${NRWHP:Host}
			   CurrentState=ReadState
			   TaskNumber=${PROTASKS:NumberTotal}
			 /> </NewBlock>

<NewBlock><Tasks
		       TargetMachine=${NRWHP:TargetMachine}      
			   TargetState=Created
			   Lib=APTUPDATE
			   User=${NRWHP:User}
			   Host=${NRWHP:Host}
			   CurrentState=ReadState
			   TaskNumber=${PROTASKS:NumberTotal}
			 /> </NewBlock>

<NewBlock><Tasks
		       TargetMachine=${NRWHP:TargetMachine}      
			   TargetState=Created
			   Lib=PKG
			   PKG=newrelic-sysmond
			   User=${NRWHP:User}
			   Host=${NRWHP:Host}
			   CurrentState=ReadState
			   TaskNumber=${PROTASKS:NumberTotal}
			 /> </NewBlock>

<NewBlock><Tasks
		       TargetMachine=${NRWHP:TargetMachine}      
			   TargetState=Created
			   Lib=RUNCOMMAND
		       Command='sudo nrsysmond-config --set license_key=${NRWHP:LicenseKey}'
			   User=${NRWHP:User}
			   Host=${NRWHP:Host}
			   CurrentState=ReadState
			   TaskNumber=${PROTASKS:NumberTotal}
			 /> </NewBlock>

<NewBlock><Tasks
		       TargetMachine=${NRWHP:TargetMachine}      
			   TargetState=Created
			   Lib=RUNCOMMAND
	           Command='sudo /etc/init.d/newrelic-sysmond start'
			   User=${NRWHP:User}
			   Host=${NRWHP:Host}
			   CurrentState=ReadState
			   TaskNumber=${PROTASKS:NumberTotal}
			 /> </NewBlock>
